name: Binary Link!
description:
Battle robots and power up in this visual novel-style fighter that combines both 2D and 3D elements!

Binary Link is a character selection turn-based fighting game that utilizes a three-hit system each turn alongside power-up chips to variate combat. 

Partake in a visual novel-style story and unlock new opponents.

Win battles and earn tokens to use in the chip gacha to further customize your loadout!
